object.displayName: Adding Devices to the Jive iPad Provisioning Profile
object.summary: In order to provision an iPad to run the Jive iPad beta software:    Find your iPad's device ID (you can do this from iTunes or Xcode with your iPad plugged in)  Login to developer.apple.com using your Apple ID  Select the "Jive Software Inc" team

object.summary: Even though it has been only a month; I can honestly, wholeheartedly, and confidently say that Philippe Van Nuijs has been a great leader, an excellent communicator; and I am truly glad to be reporting to him.    Congratulations Phillippe!
